trans-unit.source: The base class for all objects that have dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: 有依赖项属性的所有对象的基类。

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for an event of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建委托时，需要标识处理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Multiple delegates can be added to handle an event.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理的事件，可以添加多个委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of this property.
In this case, a <xref:System.Delegate> type.
Either of the arguments is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 任一参数为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The dependencyEvent represents a non-event .
Gets the value that indicates whether this instance is in design or run-time mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取值，该值指示此实例是否处于设计模式还是运行时模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance is in design mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此实例是否处于设计模式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases all the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放非托管的资源，还可以释放托管的资源由<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Provided as an override to <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to clean up any unmanaged resources deterministically.
trans-unit.target: 作为的重写提供<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>确定地清理任何非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is required only when unmanaged resources such as raw HWNDS, Win32 files handlers, and others are released.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是需要仅在非托管的资源，例如原始 HWNDS、 Win32 文件处理程序，并且其他人被释放时。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> associated with the specific <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供对访问<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>关联与特定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> associated with the specific <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Retrieves the <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>.
When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the way in which a specified binding is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写此方法可以用于自定义在其中解析指定的绑定的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Type> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
targetType is a null reference ().
To be added.
To be added.
Provides access to the value of the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
This member is typically used in property gets to furnish the value of the named dependency value.
trans-unit.target: 此成员通常在属性获取中用于提供命名的依赖值的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The object that represents the value of the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

Provides access to the bound object of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> and bypasses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*> override.
trans-unit.target: 提供对绑定对象的访问权限<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>并跳过<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>重写。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override implementation.
Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override code invokes the GetValueBase, and then adds additional code.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>重写代码时，将调用 GetValueBase，，然后添加附加代码。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For implementing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>/<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to get the value of.
The bound object of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
This bypasses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*> override.
dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyProperty为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 对在派生类中重写时的依赖项属性执行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine during the initialization of the activity at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时在活动初始化期间由工作流运行时引擎调用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is set as a binding.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否的值<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>设置为绑定。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding*>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to test.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if set as a binding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设置为绑定;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyProperty为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref> of this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> equals the <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref> of the parameterized <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref>此<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>等于<xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref>的参数化<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This uses the `==` operator as defined for the type of private member `metaproperties`, which is <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 这将使用`==`运算符，如私有成员的类型定义`metaproperties`，即<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> to compare with for equality.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref>相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> graph.
The parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> graph.
Removes an <xref:System.EventHandler> from an associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Provided as a convenient direct method for removing an event delegate.
trans-unit.target: 作为用于移除事件委托的方便直接方法提供。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of this property.
In this case, a <xref:System.Delegate> type.
Either of the arguments is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 任一参数为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The dependencyEvent is not an event.
The value is a and this instance is not in .
Removes a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to be removed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if operation was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果操作成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The argument is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 自变量为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> sets the value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
Similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>直接到类型事件的属性添加处理程序。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: 为相同属性调用它们时，这些方法是互斥的。

trans-unit.source: If SetBinding is called, then the values previously set using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 SetBinding，则以前设置的值，它使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>(<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>事件中) 将忽略。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with SetBinding.
trans-unit.target: 这同样适用另一种方法解决︰ <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>(<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) 将重置 SetBinding 与分配的绑定。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> to set to.
Either of the arguments is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 任一参数为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is not bindable.
This instance is not in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode*>.
Sets the value of the target <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> to set the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
bind is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: bind为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>, which is read-only.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> that represents the value.
The dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyProperty 为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to the object.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> sets a binding for the dependency property.

SetValue sets a value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> (similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event).
trans-unit.target: SetValue 设置一个值直接<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>(同样，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>直接到类型事件的属性添加处理程序)。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: 为相同属性调用它们时，这些方法是互斥的。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> is called, then the values previously set using SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>调用，然后则以前设置的值，它使用 SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>事件中) 将忽略。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这同样适用另一种方法解决︰ SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) 将重置<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>分配的绑定</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to be set.
The <xref:System.Object> to set the value to.

Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object>, bypassing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*>.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>到指定的<xref:System.Object>、 跳过<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override implementation.
Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override code would do some custom logic before calling the SetValueBase method.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>重写代码将调用 SetValueBase 方法之前执行一些自定义逻辑。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For setting a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to be set to the <xref:System.Object>.
The <xref:System.Object> that becomes the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyProperty为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the Site component of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置到的站点组件的引用<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Site component of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that associates custom data with this class instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>将自定义数据与此类实例关联。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: This property is a `metaproperty`, which means it is immutable at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是`metaproperty`，这意味着在运行时是不可变。

trans-unit.source: `Metaproperties` do not change after a property instance is created at run time, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.
trans-unit.target: `Metaproperties`不要更改后的属性实例创建在运行时，因此该属性必须在设计时设置为文本值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used in the default <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> declaration implementations provided by Windows Workflow Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下不使用此属性<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>由 Windows Workflow Foundation 提供的声明实现。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: This collection is not serialized; data that the collection contains is not persisted from design time to run time.
trans-unit.target: 此集合未序列化;集合中包含的数据不会从设计时，运行时保留。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that acts as an extensibility hook for developers to manipulate <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> declarations for a design tool and associate custom data with individual activity declarations.
trans-unit.target: 字典，它用作扩展性挂钩，供开发人员用于操作<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>声明对设计工具，将自定义数据与单个活动声明关联。
